short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A minimalistic to-do list extension to keep track of tasks for today.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Today's Todo List
1) Simple
2) No Login Needed
3) No Frills - Easy to Use
4) Minimalist Design
5) Just for you 

I'm a solo developer. I love making chrome extensions. Give a word of encouragement, or request a feature here: https://www.reddit.com/r/Todays_todo_list.
